news.title: Teachers and doctors in England given 4% pay rise
news.summary: But health unions react angrily after a smaller rise of 3.6% is announced for other NHS staff, including nurses and midwives.

news.title: UK net migration in 2024 almost halves to 431,000, ONS estimates
news.summary: The ONS says the yearly decline in net migration is the biggest numerical drop on record.

news.title: Investigating Israel's strike on Gaza's European Hospital
news.summary: BBC Verify analysed footage, gathered witness testimony and spoke to munitions and legal experts to examine how one of Gaza's last functioning hospitals came under Israeli attack.

news.title: Pregnant women evacuated after large fire breaks out at maternity hospital
news.summary: Pregnant women and babies are being evacuated on to the road outside of St Michael's Hospital.

news.title: More hurricanes forecast for Atlantic as Trump cuts raise storm tracking fears
news.summary: The warning comes as cuts to American research raise fears over the ability to track and prepare for them.

news.title: 'Multiple fatalities' after small plane crash in San Diego neighbourhood
news.summary: Several homes were destroyed and cars caught fire after the private aircraft crashed, forcing the evacuation of 100 people.

news.title: Chemical castration for sex offenders to be trialled in more prisons
news.summary: Justice Secretary Shabana Mahmood is also exploring whether chemical castration could be made mandatory.

news.title: Glastonbury glampers left thousands out of pocket after luxury yurt firm goes bust
news.summary: Festivalgoers who booked through Yurtel have been left ticketless and out of pocket.

news.title: 90 lorry loads of humanitarian aid now in Gaza after three-day delay
news.summary: The aid, including flour and baby food, was picked up three days after Israel eased an 11-week-long blockade.

news.title: What we know so far
news.summary: Police say the victims, a young couple, were shot by a man who shouted "free, free Palestine".
